dmca.title: Notification of Claimed Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Josh Catone [mailto:josh@railsforum.com] 
Sent: Monday, March 05, 2007 12:04 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Re: Notification of Claimed Infringement

I have reviewed that document and believe that I have complied fully 
with all provisions therein.

I have included references to the infringing work, the original work, 
proof of ownership of my copyright, and a statement made in good faith 
that this work is not being used with authorization of the copyright 
holder (me).  I make these statements under penalty of perjury that I am

authorized to act on behalf of the copyright holder (me).

I believe that in not complying with this DMCA takedown request you are 
being both unreasonable and violating the provisions of this law.  
Please comply with this request and remove the infringing material from 
your servers immediately.

Signed,

Josh Catone
BOX 171
West Kingston, RI
02892
(940) 234-7104


Copyright wrote:
> To Whom It May Concern:
>
> Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does
not
> substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
> Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").
>
> Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
> claim.
>
> Please visit our web site at
>
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
> nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
>  
> Legal Response Team
> THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Josh Catone [mailto:josh@railsforum.com] 
> Sent: Sunday, March 04, 2007 3:43 AM
> To: Copyright
> Subject: Notification of Claimed Infringement
>
> Andrea Z. Almeida,
>
> I am writing about a piece of material on one of your servers that 
> infringes on my copyright.
>
> The unauthorized copy: http://tutorialbus.com/index.php?id=wrapper2
>
> My original: 
> http://www.photoshopdigest.com/text-effects/wrapped-text-effect/
>
> I have not authorized anyone to republish that work.  It was created 
> exclusively for me by Nick from flash-game-design.com, and I own full 
> rights to it.  It should appear only on my site, photoshopdigest.com.
>
> My work has been listed on Good-Tutorials.com since December 19, 2006:

> http://www.good-tutorials.com/tutorial/15622
>
> This PREDATES the registration of the tutorialbus.com domain, proving 
> that my work did in fact come first.
>
> Please remove the infringing work from your servers.
>
> Thank you,
>
> Josh Catone
> BOX 171
> West Kingston, RI 02892
> josh@railsforum.com
> josh@section8networks.com
>
>   

-- 
Josh Catone
Rails Forum Admin
http://railsforum.com/
josh@railsforum.com
